name: Kaedehara Kazuha
storytitle: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves: Kaedehara Kazuha
storytext: Flowers and birds are a dear pleasure to one winding under the moonlight.
source: Reward for inviting Kaedehara Kazuha to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Chihayaburu
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115051]</color> to this character. \nIf this skill triggers Swirl, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115051]</color> is converted to the Swirled Element.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the Skill DMG is finalized:</color> Your team switches to the next character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Midare Ranzan</color> to this character. \nIf this skill triggers Swirl, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Midare Ranzan</color> is converted to the Swirled Element.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the Skill DMG is finalized:</color> Your team switches to the next character.
skills.description:
Deals 1 Anemo DMG, attaches Midare Ranzan to this character. 
If this skill triggers Swirl, Midare Ranzan is converted to the Swirled Element.
After the Skill DMG is finalized: Your team switches to the next character.

skills.name: Kazuha Slash
skills.description: Deals 1 Anemo DMG and summons Autumn Whirlwind.
